title: My pc freeze every time i log in game
body:
Hello guys, 
i did the last update of windows 10 today morning, 
so as always i opened the client i logged in ranked and at the time that i logged in, my pc crashed,
i pressed the I/O button to unstuck my pc , i reconnect into the game and everything were ok, but with some kind of lag,
next game the same thing happened, till now i have this problem.
Yesterday night before the update i didnt have any problem playing the game

replies.body: I have the same problem but I can't turn off my pc, I have to wait that my pc have no longer power.

i found the problem bro,
go to lol shortcut<properties<compatibility and check the box "run this program in compatibility mode for: windows 7"

Alternatively, a lot of players are reporting this can be resolved by disabling the Xbox Game DVR feature that was enabled by default in the Windows 10 Anniversary update. [Here's](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) a guide on how to do this.

Let me know if you have any questions.
